company.name: Razorpay
company.description: Razorpay is India's leading payments platform helping businesses of all sizes collect payments online and offline. We offer a complete payment solution including payment gateway, UPI, cards, netbanking, wallets, and business banking.
company.target_customers: Businesses, startups, enterprises, e-commerce companies, SaaS platforms, freelancers

payment_gateway.name: Payment Gateway
payment_gateway.description: Accept payments online through 100+ payment methods including UPI, cards, netbanking, and wallets

payment_links.name: Payment Links
payment_links.description: Create and share payment links without any coding. Perfect for invoicing and quick payments

razorpay_x.name: RazorpayX Business Banking
razorpay_x.description: Complete business banking solution with current account, expense management, payroll, and vendor payments

pos.name: POS Solutions

payment_gateway.domestic: 2% per transaction (no setup fee, no annual charges)
payment_gateway.free_tier: No free tier, pay per transaction

faq.question: What does Razorpay do?
faq.answer: Razorpay is a payments platform that helps businesses accept payments online and offline. We provide payment gateway, UPI, cards, netbanking, business banking, and complete financial solutions for businesses of all sizes.

faq.question: Do you have a free tier?
faq.answer: We don't have a traditional free tier, but we operate on a pay-per-transaction model with no setup fees or annual charges. You only pay when you receive payments - 2% for domestic transactions.

faq.question: Who is this for?
faq.answer: Razorpay is perfect for any business that needs to accept payments - from small startups and freelancers to large enterprises. This includes e-commerce companies, SaaS platforms, service providers, restaurants, retail stores, and any business selling online or offline.

faq.question: What payment methods do you support?
faq.answer: We support 100+ payment methods including UPI (Google Pay, PhonePe, Paytm), all major credit and debit cards, netbanking from 58+ banks, wallets like Paytm, Amazon Pay, and international cards for global payments.

faq.question: How quickly do I get my money?
faq.answer: We offer instant settlements for verified businesses. Typically, settlements happen within 2-3 business days, but with our instant settlement feature, you can get your money in real-time for a small additional fee.

faq.question: Is it safe and secure?
faq.answer: Absolutely! We're PCI DSS Level 1 compliant and use bank-level security with 256-bit SSL encryption. We also have advanced fraud detection and prevention systems to protect both you and your customers.

faq.question: How do I integrate Razorpay?
faq.answer: We offer multiple integration options: simple payment links (no coding required), API integration for developers, plugins for popular platforms like Shopify, WooCommerce, Magento, and mobile SDKs for apps.

faq.question: What are your transaction fees?
faq.answer: Our pricing is transparent: 2% per domestic transaction and 3% for international transactions. No setup fees, no annual charges, no hidden costs. You only pay when you receive payments.

faq.question: Do you offer business banking services?
faq.answer: Yes! RazorpayX offers complete business banking including current accounts, automated payouts, expense management, vendor payments, payroll processing, and corporate cards - all integrated with our payments platform.

faq.question: Can I accept international payments?
faq.answer: Yes, we support international cards and payments. You can accept payments from customers worldwide with automatic currency conversion and competitive forex rates at 3% per transaction.

faq.question: What kind of support do you provide?
faq.answer: We provide 24/7 customer support through phone, email, and chat. We also offer dedicated relationship managers for enterprise clients, detailed documentation, and integration support from our technical team.

faq.question: How long does the onboarding take?
faq.answer: Onboarding typically takes 2-3 business days after document submission. For simple payment links, you can start accepting payments immediately. Full KYC verification is required for settlements and advanced features.
